Reviews.Title: Sprint Nextel Motorola Rugged Buzz BUZZ Powersource ic502 IC502 ic IC 502 Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Ramon Tinio
Reviews.Content: I'd been wanting to get this phone for a while.  Found it on Van Wert Wireless via Amazon.  Great purchase and got the phone in a reasonable time.  Phone had a SIM card which was unusual for a Sprint phone but was able to swap phone out seamlessly.  Thanks Van Wert for the good deal.  Will purchase from these guys again.

Reviews.Title: Salesman Likes this one
Reviews.Author: Business Owner
Reviews.Content: In our construction industry, it is important not to miss calls when you are using two-way.  This is the only phone that allows that technology.  We are sad to see it being discontinued.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the phone.
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Phone works great. Arrived earlier then expected. This is my 3rd ic502 phone. Since all I really need is a phone this saved me from having to purchase a new phone from Sprint an sign a new contract. Went to the local Sprint store to initialize and down load all my contacts, was in and out in 10 minute.

Reviews.Title: Cannot be activated by Sprint
Reviews.Author: Yossarian22
Reviews.Content: We got this product in November or December of 2012, went in to activate to replace a broken phone, and they said they're unable to do so anymore as of just a month or two ago(November or October of 2012). Waste of money, and Sprint lost even more points for expecting us to know that.

Reviews.Title: It is sturdy and all you need!
Reviews.Author: Nolan
Reviews.Content: It is a nice simple, flip phone and I really like it.It is really firm and sound clear. It also has good reception. With sprint.

Reviews.Title: Not used with sprint
Reviews.Author: kaibunny143
Reviews.Content: We brought it to the sprint store. Hoping to be able to use it. And we were told it is NOT compatible with Sprint! What?!?!?

Reviews.Title: The Phone Rocks!!
Reviews.Author: Emigdio Aguila
Reviews.Content: The Pastor will be happy from the gift that we got him! Blessings to your company! Thanks You very much!Regards,Emi Aguila

ProductInfo.Features:
Motorola i680 phone for Nextel.
Phone is for Nextel IDEN service and will not work with CDMA service
Military Specs! Water, Dust and Shock resistant.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola ic502 Dual iden/CDMA Rugged Cell Phone
